description.value: When subject to an effect that imposes the dominated condition that a save can end, Shemeshka can make a saving throw against that effect.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+26 vs. AC

Hit: 1d6 + 5 damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).

Recharge 4-6 ✦ psychic

Standard

Requirement: Shemeshka must be in friendly fiend form.

Effect: Shemeshka makes the following attack.

Attack: Ranged 10 (two creatures)

+26 vs. Will

Hit: 2d10 + 7 psychic damage, and the target is pulled 5 squares and dazed (save ends).

Encounter ✦ fear, psychic

Standard

Attack: Close burst 5 (enemies in the burst)

+26 vs. Will

Hit: 5d6 + 9 psychic damage, and the target moves its speed away from Shemeshka.

At-Will ✦ polymorph

Minor

Effect: Shemeshka can alter her physical form to take on the form of A'kin the Friendly Fiend, or return to her form as Shemeshka the Marauder. When she takes on the marauder form, she can use call groom guardians. When she is in friendly fiend form, she can use mind lure.

Recharge when Shemeshka uses enforce contract ✦ charm, psychic

Minor

Effect: One creature that Shemeshka can see must choose to take ongoing 20 psychic damage (save ends) or be dominated (save ends).

Recharge when first bloodied

Minor

Requirement: Shemeshka must be in marauder form.

Effect: Shemeshka summons five groom guardians. Each groom guardian appears in an unoccupied square within 10 squares of Shemeshka.

Recharge when Shemeshka uses bind

Triggered

Trigger: Shemeshka is hit by an enemy's melee or ranged attack.

Effect (Immediate Interrupt): A creature affected by Shemeshka's bind power becomes the target of the triggering attack. Using this power ends the effect of bind on that creature.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ illusion

Triggered

Trigger: Shemeshka is hit by an enemy.

Effect (Immediate Reaction): Shemeshka shifts 3 squares and is invisible until the end of her next turn or until she attacks.

2/Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: Shemeshka takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage.

Effect (Free Action): Shemeshka gains resist 15 to the triggering damage type until the end of the encounter or until she uses variable resistance again.

Resist 15 psychic 		Init +16 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 37Fort 35Ref 38Will 36
Speed 6
Ability ScoresStr 14 (+13)
Con 22 (+17)		Dex 20 (+16)
Int 28 (+20)		Wis 23 (+17)
Cha 25 (+18)
Languages All
Alignment Evil
Skills Bluff +23, Diplomacy +23, Insight +22Senses Blindsight 10
Passive Perception 27 | Insight 32

Traits

Using this power ends the effect of bind on that creature.</p>]] Enforce Contract ✦ Recharge when Shemeshka uses bind
